verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: sacha baron] [ARGM-DIS: cohen] [ARG2: pranks] [V: bafta] [ARG1: awards] [ARGM-MNR: by killing old woman] [ARGM-TMP: while accepting britannia comedy award in los angeles chaplin ryan seacrest grace cullington kim jong il charlie chaplin britannia sacha baron cohen charlie chaplin singer]

sacha baron cohen pranks bafta awards by [V: killing] [ARG1: old woman] while accepting britannia comedy award in los angeles chaplin ryan seacrest grace cullington kim jong il charlie chaplin britannia sacha baron cohen charlie chaplin singer

sacha baron cohen pranks bafta awards by killing old woman while [V: accepting] [ARG1: britannia comedy award] [ARGM-LOC: in los angeles] chaplin ryan seacrest grace cullington kim jong il charlie chaplin britannia sacha baron cohen charlie chaplin singer

sacha baron cohen pranks bafta awards by killing old woman while accepting britannia comedy award in los angeles chaplin ryan seacrest grace cullington kim jong il [V: charlie] chaplin britannia sacha baron cohen charlie chaplin singer
